name: Defense of the Fantasy Robots
description: Defense of the Fantasy Robots is a Tower-Defense game that focuses on tactical and strategical depth.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or Later Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or Later Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
